content: 1 spring ahead beanie this hat pattern is very easy to manipulate for different weights of yarn and different size heads the ribbing needs to be a multiple of 2 stitches and the body needs to be a multiple of 7 there is a round of plain knit right after the rib- bing for you to make the nec- essary increases evenly around to reach your multiple of 7 3 sizes have been included child approx 19-20 inch head circumference ladies approx 22-23 inch head circumference men s approx 24-25 inch head circumference they are written in the pattern as follows child ladies men s materials abbreviations 80g approx 200 yds of dk weight yarn co cast on size 4 0mm 6 us needles for working in the k knit round p purl darning needle k1tlb knit 1 sts through the back loop k2tog knit 2 stitches together gauge stockinette in the round st stitch sts stitches 6sts and 8 row in 1 inch increase kfb knit front and back spring ahead beanie by cozy up designs 2 pattern cast on 104 112 118 sts using long tail cast on ribbing row 1 *k1tbl p1* repeat ** to end of round repeat row 1 for 1 5 2 5 3 inches or until desired length child and men s sizes knit around increasing 1 st ladies knit around body round 1 *k6 p1* repeat ** to end of round round 2 k3 *p1 k6* repeat ** to last 4 sts p1 k3 repeat rounds 1&2 for approx 5 6 7 inches or until desired length the crown decreases are quite rapid and will not add much depth to the hat crown decreases round 1 k1 k2tog *p1 k4 k2tog* repeat ** to last 4 sts p1 k3 round 2 *k2tog k3 p1* repeat ** to end round 3 k1 p1 *k4 p1* repeat ** to last 3 sts k3 round 4 *k4 p1* repeat ** to end of round round 5 *k1 k2tog k2tog* round 6 k2tog around note for child and men s repeat to last 3 sts k3tog round 7 *k2tog* to end cut a 6 inch tail thread through remaining stitches on needle and cinch tight we would love to see your spring ahead beanie tag us on instagram @cozyupknits and use #springaheadbeanie spring ahead beanie by cozy up designs
